structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

text.section: The council shall be attached to the Department for Local Government for administrative purposes.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 117, sec. 54, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 47, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 69, sec. 34, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 3, July 14, 1992.
